personal_info.location: New York, New York, United States
personal_info.nationality: Canadian (University of Waterloo alumnus, now US-based)

achievements: Co-founded **Highbeam**, building AI-powered finance agents for consumer brands, helping manage $5B+ in transactions.
Raised **$30M Series A** (2025) led by Acrew Capital.
Launched **Highbeam Intelligence**, the first agentic finance platform (AI Analyst, Bookkeeper, Treasury Agent).
Open source contributor since high school; developed plugin with 200K+ downloads acquired by Shareaholic.
Winner of **Google Code-in 2011**; invited to Google HQ as one of 10 global winners.

previous_education: University of Waterloo – BCS in Computer Science (2014 – 2018)

recent_achievements: Scaled Highbeam to manage $5B+ in transactions.
conversation_starters: Ask about the launch of Highbeam Intelligence and how agentic finance compares to traditional SaaS dashboards.
Discuss his experience scaling from engineer at Venmo/Shopify to founder of an AI fintech startup.
Bring up his early open source success (Google Code-in, Shareaholic acquisition).
Explore thoughts on AI’s role in automating treasury, bookkeeping, and cash flow planning.
notable_projects: Open Source Social Sharing Plugin (200K+ downloads)

credibility_indicators: Founder & CTO of Highbeam with Series A funding
Track record at Alloy.ai, Venmo, Shopify, Paytm Labs
Open source contributor with real-world adoption
potential_red_flags: Founder background is strongly technical – may raise questions about depth in finance domain (but mitigated by Highbeam traction).
person_analysis.overview: Gautam Gupta is the Co-founder & CTO of Highbeam, an AI-powered finance platform for consumer brands that recently raised a $30M Series A. With prior engineering roles at Alloy.ai, Venmo, Shopify, and Paytm Labs, he brings a decade of fintech and software expertise. His early open source contributions and Google Code-in win set the stage for a career blending technical depth with entrepreneurial vision.
person_analysis.executive_summary: Gautam Gupta is a Waterloo-trained computer scientist and fintech entrepreneur, now Co-founder & CTO of Highbeam. He has scaled the company into a leading AI-powered finance infrastructure provider, recently securing $30M in Series A funding. With prior experience at top fintech companies and a long-standing open source track record, Gautam blends technical expertise with startup execution.
key_insights: Highbeam is positioning itself as the AI-powered finance stack for consumer brands.
Raised significant venture backing, indicating investor confidence in product-market fit.
Deep engineering background provides credibility in building complex fintech infrastructure.
Open source and early recognition (Google HQ invite) show long-standing technical excellence.
